entities.name: CLOUD AND AI
entities.description: An engineering group focused on developing cloud infrastructure, server, database, CRM, ERP, management and development tools, AI cognitive services, and other business process applications and services for enterprises.

entities.name: EXPERIENCES AND DEVICES
entities.description: An engineering group focused on instilling a unifying product ethos across end-user experiences and devices, including Office, Windows, Enterprise Mobility + Security, and Surface.

entities.name: AI AND RESEARCH
entities.description: An engineering group focused on AI innovations and other forward-looking research and development efforts spanning infrastructure, services, applications, and search.

entities.name: LINKEDIN
entities.description: An engineering group focused on services that transform the way customers hire, market, sell, and learn.

entities.name: GAMING
entities.description: An engineering group focused on developing hardware, content, and services across a large range of platforms to help grow the user base through game experiences and social interaction.

relationships.relationship_description: Both are engineering groups within the same company focusing on different aspects of product development and user experience.
Both are engineering groups within the same company focusing on AI and infrastructure development.
Both are engineering groups within the same company focusing on user experiences and AI innovations.
Both are engineering groups within the same company focusing on different aspects of user experiences and services.
Both are engineering groups within the same company focusing on AI research and customer-related services.
Both are engineering groups within the same company focusing on gaming experiences and customer-related services.
